title: Korah’s Rebellion
summary: Numbers 16 records the rebellion of Korah, Dathan, and Abiram against Moses and Aaron’s leadership. God judges the rebels by causing the earth to swallow them and sending fire to consume others. Aaron intercedes with incense to stop a deadly plague.

faq.question: What was Korah’s complaint?
faq.answer: He challenged Moses’ and Aaron’s leadership, claiming all the people were holy.

faq.question: How did God respond?
faq.answer: The ground opened up to swallow the rebels, and a plague struck down many others.
